name: Karin Sim
tagline: Involved in researching Discourse in Machine Translation, as part of the MODIST project with Sheffield University.  My work is specifically on coherence, and assessing this computationally in an MT context.  Interested in Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning in general.
body: “In its communicative function, language is a set of tools with which we attempt to guide another mind to create within itself a mental representation that approximates the one we have.” Scott Delancey
